message.body: Hey! Just saw your fbook post. Congrats! Are you looking for someone to take your apt? My bf is moving to NYC for grad school and still needs to find one. Also, his band is playing in NYC this weekend and my bf and the bassist are looking for a place to stay...
Oh Jess I'm not living in the city anymore! Wish I could help! He doing tip
Ah, np. That's so cool about you and grad school though. Where you Goin?
Dynamic media institute in boston. Wait is he at the I t p program at NYu
Do you know anyone who's looking for a roommate in NYC? Mikes having a rough time finding a place
I don't I'm sorry. I know that graham Watson is living at home, maybe he wants a place? Probs not tho. Everyone i know goes thru Craigslist.
